markdownRemark.html:
We’ve done a major rewrite in an attempt to simplify the settup process, and clarify how centralized and dependant on GitHub this method really is.

Recently, there has been a lot of discussion regaring Centralization and the DID spec.

General: current language precludes DIDs/methods leased from an authority Decentralized Identifier: “Decentralized” in working group name
